name: Horse Riding Adventure Hero 3D
description:
Horse Riding Adventure Hero 3D game is jumping horse game and realistic 3D graphics that gives users a new experience and it is a challenge for many modern horse racing games. This Horse riding game is a Brand new Version of Jumping Horse Champions. A game that is full of horse adventure with characteristics of simulation and adventure. This animal game brings the experience of a horse show jumping in Horse riding 3d game.

In Horse Riding Adventure Hero 3D game You have to prove your ability as a Horse jockey on various obstacle courses. You learn about the game when you play it. Horse rider has to correctly lead the horse and complete every course by Horse show jumping as best as possible. Horse jockey in Horse riding games show jumping on route by crossing many obstacles in this Horse riding 3d game.
Amazing game: Simulation, adventure, equestrian, riding and jumping !

With one finger swipe you move yourself over the equestrian center and by Horse riding you reach on competition place for Horse show jumping 3d in horse world. On the back of your horse you can almost feel his steps and to change the direction you only have to tilt the device correspondingly. And so you go up and over every obstacle by horse jumping.
Ride fast, jump over fences, and enjoy the horse tournament! Complete different show jumping tasks during the contest in given time.
Join the horse world, become Horse jockey in riding game. Show horse Jumping in Horse riding games and have fun!

Horse Riding Adventure Hero 3D Features:
 • Easy to Play.
• Realistic riding fences.
• Attractive Environment in this dream Horse riding game. 
• Simple and intuitive controls.
• You feel yourself like a jockey at horse show jumping riding game.
• User Friendly Graphical User Interface.
• Attractive Objects and amazing 3D Animations.
• Real Experience of horse jumping world .
• Real simulation of furious Horse 3d adventure.
• Stunning 3D Graphics and Real horse riding game features.
• Amazing sound effects in horse riding 3D Game.
• Its a paid game available on app store.
